questions.text: What does the term '5G' stand for?
Which feature of 5G is most critical for real-time control applications in IIoT, such as remote surgery or controlling autonomous robots?
The ability of 5G to connect a very large number of low-power devices per square kilometer is known as:

options: A way to create multiple virtual networks on top of a common physical infrastructure
A method for reducing network coverage
questions.correctAnswer: A way to create multiple virtual networks on top of a common physical infrastructure

questions.text: How can network slicing benefit an IIoT deployment in a factory?
options: By creating a dedicated, isolated network slice with guaranteed low latency for critical robot control, separate from a slice for non-critical sensor data
By making the factory Wi-Fi faster for employees' personal phones
By reducing the number of antennas needed
questions.correctAnswer: By creating a dedicated, isolated network slice with guaranteed low latency for critical robot control, separate from a slice for non-critical sensor data

questions.text: The future of IIoT is likely to involve a convergence of AI, 5G, and which other technology?
What does the term 'Time-Sensitive Networking' (TSN) refer to?
options: A social media network for sharing old photos
A set of IEEE standards to provide deterministic messaging on standard Ethernet
A type of clock that is very accurate
A network that is only available at certain times of the day
questions.correctAnswer: A set of IEEE standards to provide deterministic messaging on standard Ethernet

questions.text: The concept of a 'lights-out' factory refers to a manufacturing facility that:
options: Is fully automated and requires no human presence on-site
questions.correctAnswer: Is fully automated and requires no human presence on-site

questions.text: What is a potential future trend for industrial robots?
options: Increased use of AI for more advanced cognitive tasks and adaptability
They will be powered by steam
They will all be controlled by a single person with a joystick
questions.correctAnswer: Increased use of AI for more advanced cognitive tasks and adaptability
